TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract WorkbookEvents_Event

summary.span: 事件接口 excel对象的事件。

span.span: Events interface for Excel object events.

summary.span: 激活工作簿时发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when a workbook is activated.

para.span: 在显示同一工作簿的两个窗口间切换时，发生WindowActivate事件，但工作簿的Activate事件不会发生。

span.span: When you switch between two windows showing the same workbook, the WindowActivate event occurs, but the Activate event for the workbook doesn't occur.

para.span: 新建窗口时不产生此事件。

span.span: This event doesn't occur when you create a new window.

summary.span: 当工作簿作为加载宏安装时，发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when the workbook is installed as an add-in.

summary.span: 当工作簿作为加载宏卸载时，发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when the workbook is uninstalled as an add-in.

para.span: 卸载加载宏时，该加载宏并不自动关闭。

span.span: The add-in doesn't automatically close when it's uninstalled.

summary.span: 在保存工作簿之后发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs after the workbook is saved.

summary.span: Excel 保存或导出到 XML 数据文件的指定工作簿中的数据后发生。

span.span: Occurs after Excel saves or exports data from the specified workbook to an XML data file.

para.span: 仅在 Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 和 Microsoft Office Excel 2003 中提供了 XML 功能，除了 XML 电子表格格式保存文件。

span.span: XML features, except for saving files in the XML Spreadsheet format, are available only in Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 and Microsoft Office Excel 2003.

summary.span: 新的 XML 数据导入到指定的 Excel 工作簿或刷新现有的 XML 数据连接之后，发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs after an existing XML data connection is refreshed or after new XML data is imported into the specified Excel workbook.

para.span: 仅在 Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 和 Microsoft Office Excel 2003 中提供了 XML 功能，除了 XML 电子表格格式保存文件。

span.span: XML features, except for saving files in the XML Spreadsheet format, are available only in Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 and Microsoft Office Excel 2003.

summary.span: 在关闭工作簿之前，先产生此事件。如果该工作簿已经更改过，则本事件在询问用户是否保存更改之前产生。

span.span: Occurs before the workbook closes. If the workbook has been changed, this event occurs before the user is asked to save changes.

summary.span: 在打印指定工作簿（或者其中的任何内容）之前，发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs before the workbook (or anything in it) is printed.

summary.span: 保存工作簿之前发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs before the workbook is saved.

summary.span: Excel 保存或将数据从指定的工作簿导出到 XML 数据文件前发生。

span.span: Occurs before Excel saves or exports data from the specified workbook to an XML data file.

para.span: 仅在 Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 和 Microsoft Office Excel 2003 中提供了 XML 功能，除了 XML 电子表格格式保存文件。

span.span: XML features, except for saving files in the XML Spreadsheet format, are available only in Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 and Microsoft Office Excel 2003.

summary.span: 刷新现有的 XML 数据连接或新的 xml 数据被导入 Excel 工作簿之前发生。

span.span: Occurs before an existing XML data connection is refreshed or before new XML data is imported into an Excel workbook.

para.span: 仅在 Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 和 Microsoft Office Excel 2003 中提供了 XML 功能，除了 XML 电子表格格式保存文件。

span.span: XML features, except for saving files in the XML Spreadsheet format, are available only in Microsoft Office Professional Edition 2003 and Microsoft Office Excel 2003.

summary.span: 停用工作簿时发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when the workbook is deactivated.

summary.span: 更改 Excel 数据模型后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the Excel data model is changed.

summary.span: 在工作簿中创建新图表时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a new chart is created in the workbook.

para.span: 每当插入新图表或将其粘贴到工作表、 图表工作表或其他工作表类型中发生事件。

span.span: The event occurs whenever a new chart is inserted or pasted in a worksheet, a chart sheet, or other sheet types.

para.span: 如果多个图表插入或者粘贴，则会发生事件的每个图表的顺序插入或粘贴。

span.span: If multiple charts are inserted or pasted, the event will occur for each chart in the order they are inserted or pasted.

para.span: 如果 chart 对象或图表工作表从一个位置移动到另一个，不会发生该事件。

span.span: If a chart object or chart sheet is moved from one location to another, the event will not occur.

para.span: 但是，如果 chart 对象和图表工作表之间移动图表时，因为必须创建一个新的图表，将发生该事件。

span.span: However, if the chart is moved between a chart object and a chart sheet, the event will occur because a new chart must be created.

para.span: 事件不会发生以下情况方案： 复制或粘贴图表工作表、 更改图表类型或图表数据源，撤消或恢复插入或粘贴图表，并加载包含图表的工作簿的更改。

span.span: The event will not occur in the following scenarios: copying or pasting a chart sheet, changing a chart type, changing a chart data source, undoing or redoing inserting or pasting a chart, and loading a workbook that contains a chart.

summary.span: 当在工作簿中新建工作表时发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when a new sheet is created in the workbook.

summary.span: 打开工作簿时，发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when the workbook is opened.

summary.span: 数据透视表关闭与其数据源的连接后发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs after a PivotTable report closes the connection to its data source.

summary.span: 数据透视表打开与其数据源的连接后发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs after a PivotTable report opens the connection to its data source.

summary.span: 在用户深化记录集或调用行集操作在 OLAP 数据透视表时引发的事件。

span.span: The event is raised when the user either drills through the recordset or invokes the rowset action on an OLAP PivotTable.

para.span: 由于记录集是以异步方式创建的，所以此事件允许自动确定已在何时完成操作。此外，由于记录集是在单独的工作表上创建的，所以需要将此事件置于工作簿级别上。

span.span: Because the recordset is created asynchronously, the event allows automation to determine when the action has been completed. Additionally, because the recordset is created on a separate sheet, the event needs to be on the workbook level.

summary.span: 当激活任何工作表时发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when any sheet is activated.

summary.span: 删除工作表之前，发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs before the worksheet is deleted.

summary.span: 当双击任何工作表时发生此事件，此事件先于默认的双击操作发生。

span.span: Occurs when any worksheet is double-clicked, before the default double-click action.

summary.span: 右键单击任一工作表时发生此事件，此事件先于默认的右键单击操作。

span.span: Occurs when any worksheet is right-clicked, before the default right-click action.

para.span: 图表工作表中不发生此事件。

span.span: This event doesn't occur on chart sheets.

summary.span: 在重新计算工作表时或在图表上绘制更改的数据之后发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs after any worksheet is recalculated or after any changed data is plotted on a chart.

summary.span: 当用户或外部链接更改了任何工作表中的单元格时发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when cells in any worksheet are changed by the user or by an external link.

para.span: 图表工作表中不发生此事件。

span.span: This event doesn't occur on chart sheets.

summary.span: 当任何工作表被停用时发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when any sheet is deactivated.

summary.span: 单击 Microsoft Excel 中的任意超链接时，发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when you click any hyperlink in Microsoft Excel.

summary.span: 标注库的图标 （动态和静态） 已完成的工作表的呈现时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a callout gallery’s icons (dynamic and static) have completed rendering for a worksheet.

para.span: 此事件可用于指示时重新启用屏幕更新或其他显示对话框，例如。

span.span: This event can be used to indicate when re-enable screen updating or display additional dialogs, for example.

summary.span: 在编辑或重新计算（针对包含公式的单元格）数据透视表中的单元格或单元格区域后发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs after a cell or range of cells inside a PivotTable are edited or recalculated (for cells that contain formulas).

para.span: 编辑或重新计算的单元格以外的任何情况下不会发生事件。

span.span: The event does not occur under any conditions other than editing or recalculating cells.

para.span: 例如，它不会发生在数据透视表进行刷新、 排序、 筛选，或深化，即使这些操作移动单元格，并可能从 OLAP 数据源检索新值。

span.span: For example, it will not occur when the PivotTable is refreshed, sorted, filtered, or drilled down on, even though those operations move cells and potentially retrieve new values from the OLAP data source.

summary.span: 在向数据透视表应用更改前发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs before changes are applied to a PivotTable.

para.span: Excel 立即执行所有更改应用于数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源，更新多维数据集语句之前，且用户已选择要应用的用户界面中更改后一刻发生的事件。

span.span: The event occurs immediately before Excel executes an UPDATE CUBE statement to apply all changes to the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to apply changes in the user interface.

summary.span: 在针对 OLAP 数据源提交对数据透视表的更改前发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs before changes are committed against the OLAP data source for a PivotTable.

para.span: Excel 立即执行 TRANSACTION 数据透视表的 OLAP 数据源之前，且用户已选择保存的更改整个数据透视表的后一刻发生的事件。

span.span: The event occurs immediately before Excel executes a COMMIT TRANSACTION against the PivotTable's OLAP data source, and immediately after the user has chosen to save changes for the whole PivotTable.

summary.span: 在放弃对数据透视表所做的更改之前发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs before changes to a PivotTable are discarded.

para.span: Excel 执行回滚事务语句对 OLAP 数据源，如果事务仍处于活动状态，并且用户已选择放弃更改后然后放弃对数据透视表中的所有已编辑的值前一刻发生。

span.span: Occurs immediately before Excel executes a ROLLBACK TRANSACTION statement against the OLAP data source, if a transaction is still active, and then discards all edited values in the PivotTable, after the user has chosen to discard changes.

summary.span: 在对数据透视表进行更改之后发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs after changes to a PivotTable.

para.span: 大多数更改期间发生在数据透视表，以便您可以编写代码以响应用户操作，如清除、 分组或刷新数据透视表中的项目。

span.span: The occurs during most changes to a PivotTable, so that you can write code to respond to user actions, such as clearing, grouping, or refreshing items in the PivotTable.

summary.span: 在数据透视表的工作表更新之后发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs after the sheet of the PivotTable report has been updated.

summary.span: 任一工作表上的选定区域发生更改时，将发生此事件（但图表工作表上的选定区域发生改变时，不会发生此事件）。

span.span: Occurs when the selection changes on any worksheet (doesn't occur if the selection is on a chart sheet).

summary.span: 更新工作表表后，发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs after the sheet table has been updated.

summary.span: 当作为“文档工作区”一部分的工作表的本地副本与服务器上的副本进行同步时，发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when the local copy of a worksheet that is part of a Document Workspace is synchronized with the copy on the server.

summary.span: 工作簿窗口被激活时，将发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when any workbook window is activated.

summary.span: 任何工作簿窗口被停用时将发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when any workbook window is deactivated.

summary.span: 任何工作簿窗口调整大小时将发生此事件。

span.span: Occurs when any workbook window is resized.
